verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Sin took charge when Adam fell
Rewarding men win with death and hell
For sin came and death upon all men had passed.
Then into the world came God's own son
He fought with sin and Jesus won
Now man may be free from sin at last.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
Chorus:
Thanks, oh thanks to him.
I need never, ever sin.
For Jesus, by one sacrifice
For me forever paid the price,
And now I have the sinless Christ within.
Thanks to him I need never, ever sin.

verse.name: v3
verse.lines:
Jesus claimed he wasn't good
Strove against sin unto blood
And as a man, he showed what man could do.
Now he has a name above all names.
He gives us power to do the same,
The overcoming power of Christ the king.
